summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS AN OUTLAW AX-30010 CARBON TECH MOTORCYCLE HELMET, SIZE: SMALL. THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTIFICATION FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 12E051000 (EQUIPMENT). THE CONTACT ATTEMPTED TO REACH THE MANUFACTURER ON APPROXIMATELY MARCH 23, 2013 AT 213-763-6185 AND 1-866-371-0281, BUT THEY FAILED TO RESPOND. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
